articles.description: The House of Representatives approves a temporary funding solution - which excludes aid for Ukraine.

articles.description: Senate Majority leader Chuck Schumer says the government will remain open for 45 days thanks to a bipartisan deal.

articles.title: Tupac Shakur: Sister calls new murder charge 'pivotal moment'

articles.description: Former PM Robert Fico, who opposes military support for Ukraine, is leading with most votes counted.
articles.title: Slovakia elections: Populist party leads as most votes counted

articles.description: As bear attacks rise in Japan's sparsely populated villages, robot wolves have become a solution.
articles.title: It's bears versus robot wolves in ageing Japan

articles.title: Redonda: Tiny Caribbean island’s transformation to wildlife haven

articles.description: Experts are optimistic of detecting life signs on a faraway world within our lifetimes - possibly in the next few years.
